entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is described as a person who has been crying and is sitting in a compartment on the train. She is hunched in a corner seat beside the window with her face pressed against the windowpane.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as a person who slides open the compartment door and sits down opposite Lily.

entities.name: tuney
entities.description: Tuney is mentioned by Lily as someone who hates her.

relationships.description: Snape interacts with Lily in the compartment on the train. He sits down opposite her and tries to talk to her.
Tuney hates Lily, as mentioned by Lily herself.
